Based on the role they perform a Questionnaire is assigned to them and they fill out the Questionnaire. CRM - (Sales Management System)_x000D_
CRM is a Software solution specially designed for handling Sales Management. Credit Risk - (Customer credit check Management System)_x000D_
Credit Risk is a Software solution specially designed for checking the credit status of the customer from which businesses are gained. The software basically is designed to take the KYC and the consent from the customer. For those customers who provide the consent, the credit report and monitoring report are obtained from the Credit Bureau. Based on the reports the customer health can be determined and business with them can either be  or discontinued._x000D_

description - Project - F-MAS (Frequency Monitoring and Analysis Systems - (F-MAS))_x000D_
_x000D_
F-MAS is a project for managing network inventory, network communication, fault management & network traffic analysis. The telecommunications service providers, are used to support a range of telecommunication services. The Operations Support Systems (OSS) collectively provides support for various elements used in Public Switched Telephone Networks, for example processing an order may require information on the services the customer already has, the network they are using, and currently available resources._x000D_

description - Project - F-MAS (Frequency Monitoring and Analysis Systems - (F-MAS))_x000D_
_x000D_
F-MAS is a project for managing network inventory, network communication, fault management & network traffic analysis. The telecommunications service providers, are used to support a range of telecommunication services. The Operations Support Systems (OSS) collectively provides support for various elements used in Public Switched Telephone Networks, for example processing an order may require information on the services the customer already has, the network they are using, and currently available resources._x000D_

Project Description:_x000D_
The objective is to implement a strategic technical solution to support the governance and monitoring of break standards - including enhancements to audit capabilities. As a part of this program, the required remediation of source system data feeds involves consolidation of data into standardized feeds._x000D_
_x000D_
These remediated data feeds will be consumed by ETL layer. The reconciliation tool is_x000D_
designed to source data from an ETL layer. The data from the Front and Back office systems,_x000D_
together with static data must therefore be delivered to ETL. Here it will be pre-processed and delivered to reconciliation tool before the reconciliation process can be performed._x000D_
_x000D_
Role and Responsibilities:_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Responsible for analyzing, designing and developing ETL strategies and processes,_x000D_
writing ETL specifications_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Requirement gathering_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Making functional documents and low level documents_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developing and debugging the Informatica mappings to resolve bugs, and identify the causes of failures_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ User interaction to identify the issues with the data loaded through the application_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developed mappings using different transformations_x000D_

As a part of this program, the required remediation of source system data feeds involves consolidation of data into standardized feeds._x000D_
_x000D_
These remediated data feeds will be consumed by ETL layer. The reconciliation tool is_x000D_
designed to source data from an ETL layer. The data from the Front and Back office systems,_x000D_
together with static data must therefore be delivered to ETL. Here it will be pre-processed and delivered to reconciliation tool before the reconciliation process can be performed._x000D_
_x000D_

Ã¢Â€Â¢ Responsible for analyzing, designing and developing ETL strategies and processes,_x000D_
writing ETL specifications_x000D_

Ã¢Â€Â¢ Making functional documents and low level documents_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developing and debugging the Informatica mappings to resolve bugs, and identify the causes of failures_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ User interaction to identify the issues with the data loaded through the application_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developed mappings using different transformations

Project Description:_x000D_
The objective is to implement a strategic technical solution to support the governance and monitoring of break standards - including enhancements to audit capabilities. As a part of this program, the required remediation of source system data feeds involves consolidation of data into standardized feeds._x000D_
_x000D_
These remediated data feeds will be consumed by ETL layer. The reconciliation tool is_x000D_
designed to source data from an ETL layer. The data from the Front and Back office systems,_x000D_
together with static data must therefore be delivered to ETL. Here it will be pre-processed and delivered to reconciliation tool before the reconciliation process can be performed._x000D_
_x000D_

Project Description:_x000D_
The objective is to implement a strategic technical solution to support the governance and monitoring of break standards - including enhancements to audit capabilities. As a part of this program, the required remediation of source system data feeds involves consolidation of data into standardized feeds._x000D_
_x000D_
These remediated data feeds will be consumed by ETL layer. The reconciliation tool is_x000D_
designed to source data from an ETL layer. The data from the Front and Back office systems,_x000D_
together with static data must therefore be delivered to ETL. Here it will be pre-processed and delivered to reconciliation tool before the reconciliation process can be performed._x000D_
_x000D_
Role and Responsibilities:_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Responsible for analyzing, designing and developing ETL strategies and processes,_x000D_
writing ETL specifications_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Requirement gathering_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Making functional documents and low level documents_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developing and debugging the Informatica mappings to resolve bugs, and identify the causes of failures_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ User interaction to identify the issues with the data loaded through the application_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developed mappings using different transformations_x000D_

Project Description:_x000D_
The objective is to implement a strategic technical solution to support the governance and monitoring of break standards - including enhancements to audit capabilities. As a part of this program, the required remediation of source system data feeds involves consolidation of data into standardized feeds._x000D_
_x000D_
These remediated data feeds will be consumed by ETL layer. The reconciliation tool is_x000D_
designed to source data from an ETL layer. The data from the Front and Back office systems,_x000D_
together with static data must therefore be delivered to ETL. Here it will be pre-processed and delivered to reconciliation tool before the reconciliation process can be performed._x000D_
_x000D_

Ã¢Â€Â¢ Responsible for analyzing, designing and developing ETL strategies and processes,_x000D_
writing ETL specifications_x000D_

Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developing and debugging the Informatica mappings to resolve bugs, and identify the causes of failures_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ User interaction to identify the issues with the data loaded through the application_x000D_
Ã¢Â€Â¢ Developed mappings using different transformations_x000D_

Project Description:_x000D_
The objective is to implement a strategic technical solution to support the governance and monitoring of break standards - including enhancements to audit capabilities. As a part of this program, the required remediation of source system data feeds involves consolidation of data into standardized feeds._x000D_
_x000D_
These remediated data feeds will be consumed by ETL layer. The reconciliation tool is_x000D_
designed to source data from an ETL layer. The data from the Front and Back office systems,_x000D_
together with static data must therefore be delivered to ETL. Here it will be pre-processed and delivered to reconciliation tool before the reconciliation process can be performed._x000D_
